short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use shortcuts in your search bar to access Reddit faster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A quick and easy way to search on reddit for users, subreddits, or queries.

To go to a user's page:
Search "u/username" on Google replacing "username" with the user you're looking for!

To go to a subreddit:
Search "r/subreddit" on Google replacing "subreddit" with the subreddit you're looking for!

To search anything on Reddit:
Search "s/query" on Google replace "query" with your search!
